COLOR_BACKGROUND_DESTRUCTIVE.comment: Color for UI elements related to destructive actions.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_DESTRUCTIVE_HOVER.comment: Hover color for UI elements related to destructive actions.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_DESTRUCTIVE_ACTIVE.comment: Active color for UI elements related to destructive actions.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ERROR.comment: Color for UI elements related to errors.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ERROR_ALT.comment: Alternative color for UI elements related to errors.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_SUCCESS.comment: Color for UI elements that have to do with success.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_TOAST_SUCCESS.comment: Background color for success toast messaging.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_TOAST_ERROR.comment: Background color for error toast messaging.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_WARNING.comment: Color for UI elements that have to do with warning.
